name: ROSMARUS Memory Foam Bath Mat 17' x 24', Water Absorbent Shower Mat, Thick Non Slip Bath Rugs with PVC Backing, Ultra Soft Bathroom Rugs for Floor & Tub, Aqua Blue

Meanwhile plush top layer traps and absorbs extra water and moisture in the bathroom, helping to keep your floors clean and dry. This is just what you need to protect your feet from the cold floor at the same time it protects your floor from moisture. YOU DESERVE IT! MACHINE WASHABLE & NEVER FADE: Completely free your hands, you can directly put our shower rug into a washing machine to get clean. Machine wash with cold water and mild detergent (no chlorine or bleach) tumble dry at low speed or hang dry. And it will not get fade, always stay nice and vibrant for years to come! WHY NOT PRESS THE BUY BUTTON NOW? 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE! All of our bathroom floor mats come with a Questions Asked Guarantee. With a one-year guarantee and attentive customer service every time you shop. NEVER THOUGHT TO MAKE A WRONG BUYING DECISION! We stand by our products 100% and want our customers to love them as much as we do!

name: Bathroom Rugs Set Memory Foam Bath Rugs Non-Slip Bath Mat Set 3 Piece,Washable Bathroom Mats,Absorbent Shaggy Rugs Super Soft U-Shaped Toilet Rug,Bahroom Carpets for Bathroom,Tub,Shower（Black）
short_description: 【Super Soft Bathroom Rug Set】: RUN HELIX memory foam bath mats are made of high-grade, high-strength rebound memory sponge, the surface is made of coral velvet material, super soft, comfortable, skin friendly. relieve foot stress and fatigue so you can enjoy the feeling of standing in the cloud! and protect your toes from the cold floor. 【Enhanced Non-slip Backing Bathroom Mats】:The upgraded PVC backing ensures exceptional anti-slip performance, securely fastening the bathroom mat to any tile or wooden floor. The non-slip design ensures safety for you and your family while using the bathroom. Please ensure the bottom surface stays dry as water on the backing may cause the mat to slip. 【Super Water Absorption Bath Mats】:Step out of the bathroom with confidence as the plush surface of our memory foam bath mat effortlessly absorbs moisture from your feet, keeping them dry and protected from the cold floor. Experience ultimate comfort and warmth you can rely on. 【Easy to clean Bath Rugs】:The memory foam bath mat is machine washable and dry, making it very easy to clean. Simply place the mat in the washing machine and wash gently in cold water without using chlorine or bleach. The mat's anti-slip and water absorption properties are not affected after washing, and the color will not fade. 【Bathroom Rugs Set 3 piece】:Our Memory Foam bathroom rug set include 1 Small Bath Rug 16"x24", 1 U-Shape toilet rug 20"x20", 1 Large Bath Rug 20"x32". Great for bathroom, vanity, vacation home, master bathroom, kids bathroom, living room,bedroom.

name: 2 pc Memory Foam Bath Mat Set by Bedford Home - Coral Fleece Embossed Pattern - Blue
short_description: SET OF 2 BATHROOM RUGS – This shower mat set includes one oversized 32-inch by 20-inch-long bath runner, perfect for tubs or double vanities, and one standard size 23.25-inch by 17-inch-long bathmat you can place in front of your toilet or pedestal sink. Each machine washable rug is easy to clean, to help keep your bathroom feeling tidy. ATTRACTIVE ACCENT RUGS – This bathroom rug set is topped with an embossed pattern coral fleece with a luxurious 280 GSM thickness that feels great underfoot. They are sure to add style and comfort to your laundry room, kitchen, or bathroom décor. NONSLIP AND MOISTURE-WICKING – The rubberized nonskid backing of these memory foam bathroom rugs helps keep them in place while you dry off. The coral fleece top of each absorbent bath mat wicks away moisture to help keep your floor dry. PRODUCT DETAILS – Materials: Memory Foam and 280 GSM Coral Fleece. Dimensions: Large – (L) 32.25” x (W) 20.25” x (H) 0.25”; Standard – (L) 24.5” x (W) 17” X (H) 0.25”. Set of 2 Bathroom Mats. Machine Washable. Color: Blue.
product_description: The Set of 2 Memory Foam Bath Rugs by Bedford Home will add comfort and luxury to your bathroom, kitchen, or laundry room. A memory foam core provides plenty of cushioned comfort as you step out of your tub or shower, while the plush and super soft coral fleece topper wicks away moisture. The backside of each memory foam bath mat is nonskid, helping to keep these floor mats safely in place as you dry off. The set includes one oversized bathroom runner rug ideal for double vanities, claw foot tubs, or large walk-in showers, and one standard size bath rug perfect for pedestal sinks and toilets. These bath rugs for bathroom are machine washable for convenient and hassle-free cleaning.

short_description: 【Super Soft & Maximum Comfort】Our bathroom rug features a high-density memory foam core with super rebound, soothing pressure for luxurious comfort. Water under mat can cause it to slip. test with foot to ensure it doesn't move before using mat. 【Multi-Purpose Bathroom Rug Set】 Includes three versatile mats: a U-shaped toilet mat 24” X 24” for snug baseboard fit, a shower mat 24” X 32” for cushioned exits, and a vanity mat 17” X 48” to shield floors from splashes. Color lock technology prevents fading after washing, the bathroom mat set is very easy to clean, hand wash or machine wash. Backed by a 90-day money-back promise-if you are not satisfied. we'll refund you no questions asked.1-year replacement for structural defects.
